Plot: U.S. Marshal Carrie Stetko tracks a killer in Antarctica, as the sun is about to set for six months.
Title: Whiteout
Writer: Jon Hoeber (screenplay), Erich Hoeber (screenplay), Chad Hayes (screenplay), Carey Hayes (screenplay), Greg Rucka (graphic novel), Steve Lieber (graphic novel)
Actors: Kate Beckinsale, Gabriel Macht, Tom Skerritt, Columbus Short
tomatoConsensus: Kate Beckinsale is as lovely as ever, and does her best with the material, but moribund pacing and an uninspired plot leave Whiteout in the cold.
